abstract: Alejandro Morales, felon diagnosed with paranoid schizophrenia, attacks his lawyer in courtroom immediately after being cleared of murder of 9-year-old boy by reason of insanity.
lead_paragraph: The defendant, Alejandro Morales, crashed around the courtroom, swinging wildly, witnesses said. He was found guilty of manslaughter in the death of Anthony Maldonado, 9.

headline.main: Cleared of Murder, a Man Punches His Lawyer
headline.print_headline: Cleared of Murder, a Man Punches His Lawyer

snippet: The defendant, Alejandro Morales, crashed around the courtroom, swinging wildly, witnesses said. He was found guilty of manslaughter in the death of Anthony Maldonado, 9.
